verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto me, <S%H413><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Gog, <S%H1463><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Magog, <S%H4031><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of Meshech <S%H4902><s%> and Tubal, <S%H8422><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him,

And say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> thee, O Gog, <S%H1463><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of Meshech <S%H4902><s%> and Tubal: <S%H8422><s%>

And I will turn thee back, <S%H7725><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> hooks <S%H2397><s%> into thy jaws, <S%H3895><s%> and I will bring thee forth, <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> thine army, <S%H2428><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%> and horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them clothed <S%H3847><s%> with all sorts <S%H4358><s%> of armor, even a great <S%H7227><s%> company <S%H6951><s%> with bucklers <S%H6793><s%> and shields, <S%H4043><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them handling <S%H8610><s%> swords: <S%H2719><s%>
Persia, <S%H6539><s%> Ethiopia, <S%H3568><s%> and Libya <S%H6316><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them; all <S%H3605><s%> of them with shield <S%H4043><s%> and helmet: <S%H3553><s%>

Gomer, <S%H1586><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his bands; <S%H102><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Togarmah <S%H8425><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> quarters, <S%H3411><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his bands: <S%H102><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee.

Be thou prepared, <S%H3559><s%> and prepare <S%H3559><s%> for thyself, thou, <S%H859><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> thy company <S%H6951><s%> that are assembled <S%H6950><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> thee, and be <S%H1961><s%> thou a guard <S%H4929><s%> unto them.

After many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt be visited: <S%H6485><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> that is brought back <S%H7725><s%> from the sword, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2719><s%> and is gathered <S%H6908><s%> out of many <S%H7227><s%> people, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5971><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have been <S%H1961><s%> always <S%H8548><s%> waste: <S%H2723><s%> but it <S%H1931><s%> is brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the nations, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5971><s%> and they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> safely <S%H983><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them.

Thou shalt ascend <S%H5927><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> like a storm, <S%H7722><s%> thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> like a cloud <S%H6051><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> thy bands, <S%H102><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> It shall also come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that at the same <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> shall things <S%H1697><s%> come <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> thy mind, <S%H3824><s%> and thou shalt think <S%H2803><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> thought: <S%H4284><s%>

And thou shalt say, <S%H559><s%> I will go up <S%H5927><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of unwalled villages; <S%H6519><s%> I will go <S%H935><s%> to them that are at rest, <S%H8252><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> safely, <S%H983><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them dwelling <S%H3427><s%> without <S%H369><s%> walls, <S%H2346><s%> and having neither <S%H369><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> nor gates, <S%H1817><s%>

To take <S%H7997><s%> a spoil, <S%H7998><s%> and to take <S%H962><s%> a prey; <S%H957><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the desolate places <S%H2723><s%> that are now inhabited, <S%H3427><s%> and upon <S%H413><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that are gathered <S%H622><s%> out of the nations, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1471><s%> which have gotten <S%H6213><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%> and goods, <S%H7075><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the midst <S%H2872><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

Sheba, <S%H7614><s%> and Dedan, <S%H1719><s%> and the merchants <S%H5503><s%> of Tarshish, <S%H8659><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the young lions <S%H3715><s%> thereof, shall say <S%H559><s%> unto thee, Art thou <S%H859><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to take <S%H7997><s%> a spoil? <S%H7998><s%> hast thou gathered <S%H6950><s%> thy company <S%H6951><s%> to take <S%H962><s%> a prey? <S%H957><s%> to carry away <S%H5375><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> to take away <S%H3947><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%> and goods, <S%H7075><s%> to take <S%H7997><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> spoil? <S%H7998><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto Gog, <S%H1463><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> when my people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> safely, <S%H983><s%> shalt thou not <S%H3808><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> it?

And thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> from thy place <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4725><s%> out of the north <S%H6828><s%> parts, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3411><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee, all <S%H3605><s%> of them riding <S%H7392><s%> upon horses, <S%H5483><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> company, <S%H6951><s%> and a mighty <S%H7227><s%> army: <S%H2428><s%>

And thou shalt come up <S%H5927><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> as a cloud <S%H6051><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> it shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> thee against <S%H5921><s%> my land, <S%H776><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> me, when I shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in thee, O Gog, <S%H1463><s%> before their eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Art thou <S%H859><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in old <S%H6931><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which prophesied <S%H5012><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> many years <S%H8141><s%> that I would bring <S%H935><s%> thee against <S%H5921><s%> them?

And it shall come to pass <S%H1961><s%> at the same <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> when <S%H3117><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> that my fury <S%H2534><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> in my face. <S%H639><s%>

For in my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> and in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%> have I spoken, <S%H1696><s%> Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> shaking <S%H7494><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

So that the fishes <S%H1709><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> creeping things <S%H7431><s%> that creep <S%H7430><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H127><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H120><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth, <S%H127><s%> shall shake <S%H7493><s%> at my presence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall be thrown down, <S%H2040><s%> and the steep places <S%H4095><s%> shall fall, <S%H5307><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> wall <S%H2346><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

And I will call for <S%H7121><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him throughout all <S%H3605><s%> my mountains, <S%H2022><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> against his brother. <S%H251><s%>

And I will plead <S%H8199><s%> against <S%H854><s%> him with pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and with blood; <S%H1818><s%> and I will rain <S%H4305><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, and upon <S%H5921><s%> his bands, <S%H102><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are with <S%H854><s%> him, an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> rain, <S%H1653><s%> and great hailstones, <S%H68><s%> <S%H417><s%> fire, <S%H784><s%> and brimstone. <S%H1614><s%>

Thus will I magnify myself, <S%H1431><s%> and sanctify myself; <S%H6942><s%> and I will be known <S%H3045><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
